tasks.label: Free port 3001
args: $pids = (netstat -ano | Select-String ':3001' | ForEach-Object { ($_ -split '\s+')[-1] } | Sort-Object -Unique); if (-not $pids) { Write-Host 'No PIDs found on 3001'; exit 0 }; Write-Host ('PIDs on 3001: ' + ($pids -join ', ')); foreach ($pid in $pids) { if ($pid -match '^\d+$' -and $pid -ne '0') { cmd /c "taskkill /PID $pid /F" | Out-Host } } ; netstat -ano | Select-String ':3001' | Out-Host

tasks.label: Free port 3001 (cmd)
args: for /f "tokens=5" %%a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3001') do taskkill /PID %%a /F & netstat -ano | findstr :3001
